original_title: Darling, Forgive Me… Drenched And Fallen Into Immorality Miho Tono
overview: Somehow my husband is in a hurry, and even when I'm eating, I just sigh. I heard that due to the recent social situation, the import of parts from overseas necessary for the production of the factory run by her husband has been delayed, and she has just asked a credit union for a large amount of loan for stable purchases. Hisada from the Shinkin bank, who was in charge, immediately comes to visit, but he plans to make it his own because of the charm of Aki, who is close to Yoshio. She approaches Aki to take advantage of her own position and through her loan approval.
title: Darling, Forgive Me… Drenched And Fallen Into Immorality Miho Tono
